commands.loop: Activates the repetition of the music.
commands.search: Search the information of a queue song.
commands.volume: Set the volume of the songs.
commands.servericon: Shows the icon of a server.
commands.emoji: Turns an emoji into an image.
commands.coins: Shows how many Tobias Snacks do you have.
commands.daily: Will Give to you the daily Tobias Snacks.
commands.dell: Erases a certain amount of messages.
commands.lyrics: Shows the lyrics of a song.
commands.bugreport: Report a bad occurrence in the use of some function
commands.memetextcolor: Changes the color of the meme text to be created.
commands.spotify: Shows the song the user is listening to on spotify

vip.notifier: Enable or disable notifications about **vip** in DM
